sentences: Scott DuBois (born April 27, 1978) is an American jazz guitarist and composer.

He recorded two albums featuring saxophonist David Liebman, Monsoon (2004) and Tempest (2006), for the Soul Note record label, three albums, Banshees (2008), Black Hawk Dance (2010) and Landscape Scripture (2012), for Sunnyside Records, and two albums, Winter Light (2015) and Autumn Wind (2017), for the ACT record label.
DuBois was named in DownBeat Magazine's 2019 Critics' Poll in the "Rising Star Guitar" Category.
